body_html: I'm going to have to eat my words. It looks like there's no way to bind ATen Tensor functions from Python automatically at the moment, so the only way I can expunge the old affine grid generator/sampler is by getting it all the way into full ATen gradient land at once.
body_text: I'm going to have to eat my words. It looks like there's no way to bind ATen Tensor functions from Python automatically at the moment, so the only way I can expunge the old affine grid generator/sampler is by getting it all the way into full ATen gradient land at once.
body: I'm going to have to eat my words. It looks like there's no way to bind ATen Tensor functions from Python automatically at the moment, so the only way I can expunge the old affine grid generator/sampler is by getting it all the way into full ATen gradient land at once.
